instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 no display 0.25A
threads.message:
Hi everyone.

CPU VCore present. Fan spins on then off then on and stays on full speed.
No USB activity light turns on but not blinking.

PPVCC_S0_CPU - 1.69V steady

Very minor liquid on U1930  pin 6.  U1930  replaced.
The rest of the board is clean.
Mac started to boot to the system and works fine, after a few hours it started to not turn on. Just turning on after SMC reset on the keyboard.
Now I get green and orange light, fan spins goes off spins again and goes full speed.
SLP and ALL_SYS_PWRGD is present
PLT_RESET_L missing

Can you help me, please?

threads.title: 820-00165 no display 0.25A
threads.message:
Check CPU_VCCST_PWRGD and CPU_VR_READY.

I suspect accumulated crap underneath CPU; heat with quality flux.
